HomePage.heroText: From household essentials to lifestyle must-haves, we bring everything to your doorstep. Shop smarter, live better.
HomePage.cleanText: Powerful and eco-friendly cleaning for a spotless, fresh home
HomePage.careText: Gentle daily care that nourishes and protects your skin naturally
HomePage.bannerDesc: We make everyday essentials that are simple, safe, and designed to fit your lifestyle. Clean living starts with quality you can trust — delivered with a lucky touch.
HomePage.newProductDesc: Our top daily essentials—trusted by families every day. From gentle soaps to reliable detergents and soft tissues, these latest products make everyday life cleaner, simpler, and more comfortable.

AboutPage.header: We are lucky to be part of your everyday routine—bringing you safe, effective, and trusted care for a cleaner, healthier home.
AboutPage.bentoTitle: Your One-Way Stop to Your Every Needs
AboutPage.partnerDesc: We proudly collaborate with trusted partners who share our commitment to quality and innovation. Together, we create greater value, drive growth, and deliver better solutions for our customers
AboutPage.qualityDesc: Our daily care products, from detergent to tissues, are made with safe, reliable ingredients—delivering quality you can trust for your everyday needs
AboutPage.linesDesc: Lucky Care and Lucky Clean are here to help with you daily needs
AboutPage.carePlanet: Made with Care for Home & Planet
AboutPage.planetDesc: We believe in products that are gentle for your family and kind to the environment. That’s why we choose safe materials, minimal packaging, and sustainable practices wherever possible
AboutPage.missionDesc: We’re here to support families with safe, gentle, and reliable essentials made for everyday life — from baby care to home cleaning — because true care begins at home, in the little things we use and trust every day.
AboutPage.visionDesc: We imagine a future where every home has access to high-quality, sustainable essentials — supporting a healthier lifestyle for families and the planet.
